message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a good deal, but I want more for myself this time!
I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but not that big!
You're not giving me enough, I need more to make it worth my while!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not giving in too much!
You're not budging, I'll take a bigger share this time!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
You're not willing to meet me in the middle, so I'll take control!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give in completely!
This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up yet!
This is my last chance, take it or we both lose!
